column2: SELECT (po.petroMag_r - po.extinction_r) as dered_petro_r, FROM SpecObjAll za JOIN PhotoObjAll po ON (po.objID = za.bestObjID) JOIN Photoz zp ON (zp.objID = za.bestObjID) JOIN galSpecInfo zi ON (zi.SpecObjID = za.specObjID) WHERE za.z > # and za.zWarning = # and za.targetType = SCIENCE and za.survey = sdss and za.class = GALAXY and zi.primtarget = # and po.clean = # and po.insideMask = # and dered_petro_r = #
